ModMetaData.name: Fallout Traits Continued
ModMetaData.author: Atlas
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 71 new perks to Rimworld based on the theme from fallout games. Updated to 1.5. I fixed the traits XML, but the rest of the work on the traits and patching XML goes to FuglyPump.
Latest Update: - Updated stats using MeleeDodgeChance to integers similiar to the Nimble trait. This should hopefully make those traits more impactful.
Previous Updates: - No longer *Requires* Carrying Capacity Fixed (Continued), but some traits will not affect caravan weight, only carrying items on the map they are currently loaded in.
